functions.tag: {CustomModelData:121212,voidborn:{item:"void_fragment"},display:{Name:'[{"text":"Fragment of the Void","italic":false,"bold":true,"color":"gold"}]',Lore:['[{"text":"As you hold this in your hands","italic":false,"color":"dark_aqua"}]','[{"text":"you feel nothing but emptiness","italic":false,"color":"dark_aqua"}]','[{"text":"and a longing to touch the void.","italic":false,"color":"dark_aqua"},{"text":"","italic":false,"color":"dark_purple"}]','[{"text":"","italic":false,"color":"dark_purple"}]','[{"text":"Boss Drop","italic":true,"color":"gold"},{"text":"","italic":false,"color":"dark_purple"}]','[{"text":"[Voidborn]","italic":true,"color":"gray"}]']}}
